item.title: Image acquisition protocol
item.description: The way the pictures of antibiograms are taken can facilitate the automatic reading and minimize the risk of errors. In order to standardize picture acquisition we have developped a simple image acquisition protocol. This protocol has been designed with simplicity in mind: it can be implemented with cardboard and simple material tipically available in every laboratory. image acquisition setup
